entry.title: Seven minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: NightWrites_leaf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 141,150Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 315

Summary: Dick Grayson decided that the Young Justice crew and the Titans needed a proper official meting, no missions, no explosions, just hanging out as a big group of friends… with some alcohol. They end up playing never have I ever and seven minutes in haven. Wally and Dick end up just a little too close in the closet and they now have to figure out what this thing between them is. The fic is filled with character dynamics, fluff, smut, crack, angst and heartbreak! - and it is currently ongoing BUT i post pretty regularly (at least one chapter a week).

entry.title: chasing the sun
entry.summary:
Author: slushyfan

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,215Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 0

Summary: Clark knew that heartbeat- he knew it from the other side of the city, the other side of the world. He knew it from space, from underground. He could tune into it anytime, like a satellite station. Batman was Bruce Wayne. Clark felt delirious at the discovery, felt as if he was invading more than his privacy. They shared the same heart, the same steady pulse. There was only one way to be sure.   // in which, bruce stalks a strange reporter who might expose his secret, gathering any information he can find about him. meanwhile, clark stalks batman by tuning into his heartbeat, and decides that it's fun seeing batman so agitated.

entry.title: How to Investigate a Bat's Heart
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,849Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 192

Summary: Bruce Wayne has been acting…strange. Disappearing on nights when there’s no patrol, coming home looking suspiciously glowy, and receiving mysterious gifts at the manor’s doorstep—flowers, pies, baskets of fresh fruit. To Dick, it’s obvious: Bruce has finally discovered a wholesome hobby.To Jason, it’s clearer: Bruce is definitely hooking up with someone.To Damian, it’s undeniable: they’re about to get a new sibling if no one figures this out fast. Determined not to be left in the dark, the Wayne brothers launch a secret investigation into their father’s suspicious behavior. Between banter, botched surveillance, and the constant risk of Bruce catching them in the act, the trio will uncover more than just a mystery—they’ll learn a little about family, love, and how far they’ll go to protect the Bat.

entry.title: Every Inch of You
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,914Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 347

Summary: "This is a love story." | "This is a detective story" When Clark Kent follows a story into Gotham, he doesn’t expect to find himself face-to-face with the city’s true guardian: a bat with fangs, claws, and a half-feral silhouette in the shadows. Suspicious, circling him like prey, Batman tests every ounce of Clark’s resolve—only for Clark’s clumsy optimism to slip through anyway (“What the hay, are those fangs?”). Between the silk shawls and champagne smiles of Bruce Wayne, Gotham’s Pretty Boy Playboy, and the smudged-eyeliner hunger of the Bat with Fangs, Clark finds himself drawn to both—the golden boy in the sun and the monster in the dark. He doesn’t break Bruce’s walls with force, but with patience, reverence, and devotion. The monster who refuses to hurt the one he loves, and the hero who would even offer his own blood to keep him alive.

entry.title: Colors
entry.summary:
Author: ladyshipper06

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 707Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: “Why didn’t you tell me?” Bruce’s voice is low, almost a whisper, yet it carries the weight of something deeper than reproach. His gray-blue eyes lift to meet Clark’s, and for a brief moment, the world seems to stop. His gaze is clear, cold, but not harsh. There is no judgment in it, not even anger—only silent understanding. “I didn’t know,” Clark answers, his voice trembling. There’s exhaustion in his tone, a quiver born not of fear but of disappointment—disappointment in himself. His usually calm expression looks lost, disoriented, as if every word spoken by Bruce were cutting deeper than a blade. ... Then Bruce steps closer. His ungloved hand, cold and steady, rests on Clark’s shoulder with unexpected gentleness. No words follow—only a tentative touch. Clark feels his body, rigid with guilt, soften slightly. Normally, he would melt at the slightest sign of affection, but this time he only relaxes a little. A few seconds later, he bows his head and closes his eyes for a moment, accepting the comfort offered. [...] What would have happened if Batman were present in the 2025 Superman movie?

entry.title: Solar Flare
entry.summary:
Author: brmqtr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,190Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: A solar anomaly leaves Clark Kent dangerously overcharged — glowing like a small sun and unable to touch anything without burning it. While the Justice League scrambles for solutions, Bruce Wayne locks himself in the Batcave, designing containment tech fueled by caffeine, stubbornness, and denial. Clark isolates himself in orbit, terrified of hurting anyone. Bruce refuses to leave the comm line open to silence. And somewhere between physics and feeling, he decides the only way to ground the sun… is to hold it. Romantic tension ignites amid science, sarcasm, and half a dozen shorted-out circuits. Because when the world’s brightest man meets its most immovable one, sometimes love looks a lot like heat transfer — and sometimes the sunrise over Gotham comes softly, already accounted for.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,863Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 112

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes.Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki.He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.”After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. entry.summary:
Author: Deluv_011

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,985Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 109

Summary: Damian Wayne and Conner Kent form an unexpected couple. However, few knew that behind that façade, each of them had their heart burning for someone else. Thus, Damian and Conner cling to each other as a distorted reflection of what they truly long for. Damian yearns for Jon Kent. Conner pines for Tim Drake. And the deeper they fall into that strange relationship, the more they begin to notice certain glances among their teammates… glances that reveal far more than mere friendship.

entry.title: The Scientific Method
entry.summary:
Author: Burning_Sands999

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,493Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 184

Summary: So, yes, this is a good thing. This will be good for everyone, actually. Clark will be freed, and the kids will be safer, and Bruce… Well, he can't be selfish. Loosing Clark will destroy him, but he can't let the other man know that. Then Clark will stay out of obligation, and that's the last thing Bruce wants. So. It'll be fine.   Or:When Clark starts acting strangely, Bruce thinks he wants to breakup.Clark does not, in fact, want to break up.

entry.title: How to Introduce Your Husband to Your Super-Serious Crime-Fighting Group
entry.summary:
Author: A_Hamilton

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,786Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 1,273

Summary: “Can we meet him some day?” Clark hesitated. It wasn’t as though his professional life and his personal life overlapped very often, Bruce and the kids being some of the very few exceptions. The only way Clark would be able to introduce Bruce to the League, aside from him getting kidnapped and them having to save him, would probably be to bring him up to the Watchtower. Out of the suit. As a civilian. And Clark didn’t see Batman being comfortable with that any time soon. “Probably not, but we’ll see.” ~•~•~ Or, Clark has finally revealed his identity to the League. Who... immediately found out he was married to Bruce Wayne. If Clark had his way, Brucie and the League would stay far, far away from each other. Too bad his husband didn't get the memo.

entry.title: See my worries fly by when I look at the sky
entry.summary:
Author: maruja35

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,798Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: He's been running from it for years, but some part of him knows that one day, one day it will all catch up to him. He feels it in the moments when he's most whole, with the fewest injuries. That's when he drowns in it, an ocean of pain that isn't quite physical, for all it aches in his chest just the same.OrBruce has struggled with depression all his life, and he never lets himself want more than he has, too afraid of it crashing and burning around him. But maybe, when he's whole, the universe will thrust that "more" upon him and force him to accept it.Whumptober 2025 Day Twenty: "That's New." Symptomatic | Fancy Event | Resignation
